title: Beauty Sleep Pill with Melatonin and 5-HTP by Success Chemistry - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Experience restful sleep with Cosmic Icon® Beauty Sleep Pill by Success Chemistry. This formula combines Melatonin and 5-HTP with calming herbs like Chamomile and Valerian Root to support relaxation and sleep regulation. Enhanced with magnesium and Vitamin B6, it assists your natural sleep cycle, helping you wake up refreshed. Key Features:
  • Sleep Support: Melatonin helps regulate sleep-wake cycles.
  • Relaxation: 5-HTP and L-Theanine promote calmness.
  • Calming Effects: Herbal extracts support relaxation.
Ingredients:
  • Proprietary Sleep Blend: L-Tryptophan, Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Passion Flower, Valerian Root, and more.
  • Melatonin: Regulates sleep-wake cycles.
  • 5-HTP: Aids relaxation.
  • Vitamins & Minerals: Calcium, Magnesium, and Vitamin B6 support calmness and muscle relaxation.
Why Choose Cosmic Icon® Beauty Sleep Pill?
  • High-Quality Ingredients: Selected to support relaxation and restful sleep.
  • Natural and Safe: Free from artificial additives and common allergens.
  • Convenient Usage: 60 easy-to-swallow capsules provide a one-month supply.
Achieve better sleep naturally with Cosmic Icon® Beauty Sleep Pill and wake up refreshed!
shortDescriptionHtml: Achieve restful sleep and wake up refreshed with Success Chemistry's Cosmic Icon¬Æ Beauty Sleep Pill. Our natural sleep aid with Melatonin and 5-HTP promotes relaxation and improves sleep quality. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Calcium (as Calcium Carbonate) 17 mg 1%
Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine HCl) 1.8 mg 106%
Magnesium (as Magnesium Citrate) 13 mg 3%
Melatonin 10 mg **
Beauty Sleep Proprietary Blend: 905 mg **
L-Tryptophan, Goji (Wolfberry) (Lycium barbarum) (berry), Chamomile (Matricaria chamomilla) (flower), Lemon Balm (Melissa officinalis) (aerial), Passion Flower (Passiflora incarnata) (flower), L-Taurine, Hops (Humulus lupulus) (flower), St. John's Wort (Hypericum perforatum) (aerial), GABA (Gamma aminobutyric acid), Skullcap (Scutellaria baicalensis) (root), L-Theanine, Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) (root), Inositol, 5-HTP (Griffonia simplicifolia) (seed).

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Inactive Ingredients: Cellulose (Vegetable Capsule), Magnesium Stearate (Vegetable), Silicon Dioxide.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
